languages.text: Эскадры Маражая и Ирлиэт часто охотились вместе. Сородичи их удивлялись, как ладят два капитана. Изгоя и бывшего Дракона объединял совместно пережитый ужас — погружения в Имматериум, пережитые за время странствий с Вольным Торговцем, оставили мрачную печать на их душах.

Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over the horrors they had both experienced — the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a grim mark on their souls.
languages.original_text: Эскадры Маражая и Ирлиэт часто охотились вместе. Сородичи их удивлялись, как ладят два капитана. Изгоя и бывшего Дракона объединял совместно пережитый ужас — погружения в Имматериум, пережитые за время странствий с Вольным Торговцем, оставили мрачную печать на их душах.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over their shared horror, the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a sombre mark on their souls.

Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over their shared horror, the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a sombre mark on their souls.

Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over the horrors they had both experienced — the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a grim mark on their souls.

Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over the horrors they had both experienced — the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a grim mark on their souls.

Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over the horrors they had both experienced — the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a grim mark on their souls.

languages.text: 玛拉斋与伊莉耶特的舰队经常一起狩猎，他们的族人一直不清楚这两位舰长到底是怎么走到一起的。只有他们自己知道，他们是由于共同的恐怖经历而走到一起的。在他们与行商浪人旅行期间，来自亚空间的入侵者在他们的灵魂中留下了可怕的印记。
languages.original_text: Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over the horrors they had both experienced — the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a grim mark on their souls.

traits.locale_text: 玛拉斋与伊莉耶特的舰队经常一起狩猎，他们的族人一直不清楚这两位舰长到底是怎么走到一起的。只有他们自己知道，他们是由于共同的恐怖经历而走到一起的。在他们与行商浪人旅行期间，来自亚空间的入侵者在他们的灵魂中留下了可怕的印记。

languages.text: マラズハイとユリエットの船はよく一緒に狩りに出かけた。互いの同族たちはこの2人の船長がなぜ馬が合うのかと不思議がった。追放者と元ドラコンは、両者が共に経験した恐ろしい過去をきっかけに絆を深めたのだ。彼らと自由開拓者の旅の間に起こった非物質世界での侵略は、2人の魂に暗い傷を残していた。
languages.original_text: Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over the horrors they had both experienced — the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a grim mark on their souls.

traits.locale_text: マラズハイとユリエットの船はよく一緒に狩りに出かけた。互いの同族たちはこの2人の船長がなぜ馬が合うのかと不思議がった。追放者と元ドラコンは、両者が共に経験した恐ろしい過去をきっかけに絆を深めたのだ。彼らと自由開拓者の旅の間に起こった非物質世界での侵略は、2人の魂に暗い傷を残していた。

languages.text: Les flottes de Marazhai et Yrliet chassaient souvent ensemble. Leurs semblables se demandaient comment les deux capitaines parvenaient à s'entendre. L'ancien dracon et l'Errante avaient noué des liens à cause des horreurs auxquelles ils avaient été confrontés : les incursions dans l'Immaterium durant leurs voyages avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avaient laissé une marque sinistre sur leurs âmes.
languages.original_text: Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over the horrors they had both experienced — the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a grim mark on their souls.

traits.locale_text: Les flottes de Marazhai et Yrliet chassaient souvent ensemble. Leurs semblables se demandaient comment les deux capitaines parvenaient à s'entendre. L'ancien dracon et l'Errante avaient noué des liens à cause des horreurs auxquelles ils avaient été confrontés : les incursions dans l'Immaterium durant leurs voyages avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avaient laissé une marque sinistre sur leurs âmes.

languages.text: Las flotas de Marazhai e Yrliet solían cazar juntas. Sus hermanos se preguntaban cómo podían tener buena relación. La proscrita y el antiguo dracón se sentían unidos tras los horrores que habían vivido: sus incursiones al Inmaterio durante sus viajes con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente habían dejado una cicatriz negra en sus almas.
languages.original_text: Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over the horrors they had both experienced — the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a grim mark on their souls.

traits.locale_text: Las flotas de Marazhai e Yrliet solían cazar juntas. Sus hermanos se preguntaban cómo podían tener buena relación. La proscrita y el antiguo dracón se sentían unidos tras los horrores que habían vivido: sus incursiones al Inmaterio durante sus viajes con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente habían dejado una cicatriz negra en sus almas.

languages.text: Die Flotten von Marazhai und Yrliet jagten oft gemeinsam. Die Ihren fragten sich jeweils, wie die beiden Captains miteinander auskamen. Die Ausgestoßene und der frühere Dracon verstanden sich über die gemeinsam erlebten Schrecken – die Vorstöße ins Immaterium während ihrer Reisen mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} hatten dunkle Spuren auf ihren Seelen hinterlassen.
languages.original_text: Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over the horrors they had both experienced — the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a grim mark on their souls.

traits.locale_text: Die Flotten von Marazhai und Yrliet jagten oft gemeinsam. Die Ihren fragten sich jeweils, wie die beiden Captains miteinander auskamen. Die Ausgestoßene und der frühere Dracon verstanden sich über die gemeinsam erlebten Schrecken – die Vorstöße ins Immaterium während ihrer Reisen mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} hatten dunkle Spuren auf ihren Seelen hinterlassen.

languages.text: Marazhai ve Yrliet'in filoları sık sık birlikte avlandı. Soydaşları, iki kaptanın anlaşabilmesine şaşırıyordu. Yurtsuz ve eski Drakon, birlikte yaşadıkları dehşetler nedeniyle birbirlerini anlıyorlardı. Hür Tacir'le Tindiyar yolculukları sırasındaki istilalar, ikisinin de ruhunda korkunç izler bırakmıştı.
languages.original_text: Marazhai and Yrliet's fleets often hunted together. Their kin wondered how the two captains were getting along. The Outcast and the former Dracon bonded over the horrors they had both experienced — the incursions in the Immaterium during their journeys with the Rogue Trader had left a grim mark on their souls.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai ve Yrliet'in filoları sık sık birlikte avlandı. Soydaşları iki kaptanın nasıl oluyor da anlaşabildiğine şaşırıyordu. Yurtsuz ve eski Drakon, birlikte yaşadıkları dehşetler nedeniyle birbirlerini anlıyorlardı. Hür Tacir'le Tindiyar yolculukları sırasında meydana gelen istilalar, ikisinin de ruhunda korkunç izler bırakmıştı.
